65 
67  struct RinexObsType
68  {
69  std::string type;
70  std::string description;
71  std::string units;
72  unsigned int depend;
73  RinexObsType() : type(std::string("UN")),description(std::string("Unknown or Invalid")),
74  units(std::string("")),depend(0) {}
75  RinexObsType(std::string t, std::string d, std::string u, unsigned int dep=0) :
76  type(t),description(d),units(u),depend(dep) {}
77  static const unsigned int C1depend;
78  static const unsigned int L1depend;
79  static const unsigned int L2depend;
80  static const unsigned int P1depend;
81  static const unsigned int P2depend;
82  static const unsigned int EPdepend;
83  static const unsigned int PSdepend;
84  };

87 // Guards are here since an identical struct is used in RinexObsHeader and Rinex3NavHeader
88  #ifndef GPSTK_EXTRAWAVEFACT
89  #define GPSTK_EXTRAWAVEFACT
90  struct ExtraWaveFact
92  {
94  std::vector<SatID> satList;
96  short wavelengthFactor[2];
97  };
98  #endif // GPSTK_EXTRAWAVEFACT

106  class RinexObsHeader : public RinexObsBase
107  {
108  public:
109 
111 // RinexObsHeader() : version(), valid()
112  RinexObsHeader()
113  {}
114 
116  inline void clear()
117  {
118 // version = 2.11;
119  valid = 0;
120  commentList.clear();
121  wavelengthFactor[0] = wavelengthFactor[1] = 1;
122  extraWaveFactList.clear();
123  obsTypeList.clear();
124  numObsForSat.clear();
125  numObs = 0;
126  lastPRN.id = -1;
127  }
128 
134  static const std::string versionString;
135  static const std::string runByString;
136  static const std::string commentString;
137  static const std::string markerNameString;
138  static const std::string markerNumberString;
139  static const std::string observerString;
140  static const std::string receiverString;
141  static const std::string antennaTypeString;
142  static const std::string antennaPositionString;
143  static const std::string antennaOffsetString;
144  static const std::string waveFactString;
145  static const std::string numObsString;
146  static const std::string intervalString;
147  static const std::string firstTimeString;
148  static const std::string lastTimeString;
149  static const std::string receiverOffsetString;
150  static const std::string leapSecondsString;
151  static const std::string numSatsString;
152  static const std::string prnObsString;
153  static const std::string endOfHeader;

155 
157  enum validBits
158  {
159  versionValid = 0x01,
160  runByValid = 0x02,
161  commentValid = 0x04,
162  markerNameValid = 0x08,
163  markerNumberValid = 0x010,
164  observerValid = 0x020,
165  receiverValid = 0x040,
166  antennaTypeValid = 0x080,
167  antennaPositionValid = 0x0100,
168  antennaOffsetValid = 0x0200,
169  waveFactValid = 0x0400,
170  obsTypeValid = 0x0800,
171  intervalValid = 0x01000,
172  firstTimeValid = 0x02000,
173  lastTimeValid = 0x04000,
174  receiverOffsetValid = 0x08000,
175  leapSecondsValid = 0x0100000,
176  numSatsValid = 0x0200000,
177  prnObsValid = 0x0400000,
178 
179  endValid = 0x080000000,
180 
182  allValid20 = 0x080002FEB,
184  allValid21 = 0x080002FEB,
186  allValid211 = 0x080002BEB
187  };

269  virtual ~RinexObsHeader() {}

271  // The next four lines is our common interface
273  virtual bool isHeader() const {return true;}

280  virtual void dump(std::ostream& s) const;

302  int NumberHeaderRecordsToBeWritten(void) const throw();

308  void WriteHeaderRecords(FFStream& s) const
309  throw(FFStreamError, gpstk::StringUtils::StringException);
310 
312  bool isValid() const { return ((valid & allValid20) == allValid20); }
313 
314  protected:
318  virtual void reallyPutRecord(FFStream& s) const
319  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError,
320  gpstk::StringUtils::StringException);
321 
331  virtual void reallyGetRecord(FFStream& s)
332  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError,
333  gpstk::StringUtils::StringException);

348  }; // end class RinexObsHeader
349 
351  inline bool operator==(const RinexObsType& x,
352  const RinexObsType& y) { return (x.type == y.type); }
353 
355  inline bool operator<(const RinexObsType& x,
356  const RinexObsType& y) { return (x.type < y.type); }
357 
359  inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s,
360  const RinexObsType rot)
361  {
362  return s << "Type=" << rot.type
363  << ", Description=" << rot.description
364  << ", Units=" << rot.units;
365  }
